paper_abstract: An application for analysis of structures under static loading is ported to the cloud using the mOSAIC portable platform-as-a-service. The new cloud application benefits from Web availability, elasticity, and fault tolerance, while being independent from the infrastructure-as-a-service providers. This achievement paves the way for porting a range of engineering applications to multiple clouds.
paper_title: Solving Solid and Fluid Mechanics Problems in the Cloud with mOSAIC
